sentences.sContent: Women usually live longer than men.
Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.sCn: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.sContent: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.sCn: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

trans.tranOther: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations
